name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pro Property Insights: Real Estate Analyzer

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extract and analyze real estate trends and data from Zillow. Perfect for investors, agents, buyers/sellers, data analysts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension that automates extracting real estate property data from Zillow including sales data and trends. It is perfect for investors, agents, buyers/sellers, data analysts.

It's a very simple extension that is easy to use and gets the job done with no need for coding or technical knowledge.


🧪Core Features:
    ✔️Scrape unlimited sales data and trends from supported websites:
           - Zillow.com
    ✔️Download data into a formatted CSV file or Google Sheets including:
           - Number of properties sold (30-180 days ago)
           - Sales trend with time history
           - Number of currently for sale properties
           - Automatically calculated metrics
    ✔️Customize data to download
    ✔️No coding or technical knowledge needed. It's super easy to use!



🔒Permissions:
We understand there may be questions regarding the permissions needed to use the extension. We aim to be as transparent as possible hoping to inform you that we have absolutely no intent of using the access you grant to your browser maliciously. Follow the link below to read on:

https://tidisventures.com/privacy-policy?policy=pro-property-insights-chrome-ext-privacy-policy


⭐ How To Use:
The extension popup has 3 buttons that control the entire functionality of the app. Each button is to get data from the webpage, clear the data to scrape from scratch, and download the CSV file or save to Google Sheets respectively. To extract data, follow these steps:

   1. Go to Zillow.com and search for a location to analyze
   2. Open up the extension and click "Get data". Don't close the pop up while it works. The extension will automatically navigate to each page to extract the necessary data.
   3. Click "Download" when you're ready to download the data to CSV or Google Sheet.

For more info, please see the YouTube video above to learn how to use the extension. If there are any questions or other issues, please contact tidisventures@gmail.com.

Also, check the https://tidisventures.com/extensions/pro-property-insights or the support page: https://tidisventures.com/support?app=pro-property-insights


🏷️Pricing:
Upon installation of the extension, the user will be able to use the free version of the extension indefinitely. This limits the extension to 5 data points per download (downloadable CSV file is available with the basic version) and limits data to up to 90 days ago. Upgrade to the premium version to enjoy unlimited data points, data up to 180 days ago, and other awesome features.


📚Terms and Conditions:
By using this extension, you agree to the terms here: https://tidisventures.com/terms-and-conditions?app=pro-property-insights-terms, https://tidisventures.com/terms

💰Affiliate Program:
Join our affiliate program here: https://tidisventures.com/affiliate/program
